main.name: Julian Orr
main.description: I enjoy mulitple creative outlets, but I am currently attempting to become a full stack developer
main.bio: I have always been insterested in creating things. Whether it was music, or cooking, I have always been able to find plenty of time to make new things, while learning important concepts from my teachers and parents. That is why I feel like I would be a terrific developer. I have a drive to create while craving ideas.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to email, call or text if you would like more information about me

education.description: I learned the basics of programming in multiple frameworks. I also learned how to google things.
I am constantly looking for new learning opportunities. I have taken various classes at the community college.

work.title: Steward
work.description: Worked overnights cleaning the large equipment (grills, fryers, etc) for a year, now I work during the day doing various cleaning tasks

work.title: Crew Member
work.description: I worked here as soon as I got my workers permit. I worked all through high school. I still make a mean burrito.

skills.title: Git
skills.category: I am very comfortable using Git and Github, and Git pages. I might have too look up how to get out of vim.

skills.title: React.Js
skills.category: I love React! Single page web apps are awesome and intuitive.

skills.title: Ruby on Rails
skills.category: Coding in ruby is awesome! I typically go towards ruby when choosing languages to code in.

skills.title: Test Driven Development
skills.category: I would love to practice more TDD. I have experience with both Rspec and Unit testing.

skills.title: CSS
skills.category: CSS is suprising powerful. I find myself getting lost vertically while making minor edits.

skills.title: SQL
skills.category: We used SQL in our coding bootcamp, I did not throughly enjoy it, but I can definitely navigate databases.

skills.title: MVC, C#
skills.category: C# is a great language to start on,learning how to navigate multiple languages/frameworks was very helpful.

skills.title: React Native
skills.category: I am still learning React Native, hopefully by the time you see this, I will have a mobile version of my resume up.

projects.title: MovieDBSearch
projects.category: Showcases use of the MovieDB api, and a working title search

projects.title: Rogue Game
projects.category: backend coding in ruby, posted using rails

projects.title: Game of Life
projects.category: C#/MVC windows app, Conway's game of life

testimonials.text: In any moment of decision, the best thing you can do is the right thing. The worst thing you can do is nothing.
If one advances confidently in the direction of his dreams, and endeavors to live the life which he has imagined, he will meet with a success unexpected in common hours.
